compounddef.title: First assignment Research Track course - second module - jupy_sphinx branch

listitem.para:
Index:
General Instructions
Launch the node
Additional docuementation

sect1.title: General Instructions
sect1.para: This branch contains the same package of the action branch slightly modified and the documentation is done using Sphinx. In addition two Jupyter notebook are being added in the notebook folder in order to implement a GUI to better and easily control the robot in the simulation. The one called final_assignment is the complete and commented user interface, while notebook called text is to show that the plot regarding velocities wroks but they do not in final_assignment notebook, do not know why.

sect1.title: Launch the node
sect1.para: To launch the node, please run: roslaunchrt2_assignment1action_branch.launch
Once the nodes are launched start the Jupyter notebook in order to use the enhanced interface for controlling the robot

sect1.title: Additional documentation
sect1.para: can be found opening the index.html file in the *_build/html* folder
